title: 10th Gen Civic
cardDetailedText: Honda released the 10th generation of the civic in 2016. he Civic has gone through several generational changes, becoming both larger and more upscale, moving into the compact car segment

title: 2000 civic SI
cardSubtitle: One of the best civics ever made
cardDetailedText: Powered by a b16 DOHC motor, delivering 160bhp. Being one of the few card to achieve 100bhp per 1000cc

title: Porsche 911
cardDetailedText: The Porsche 911 (pronounced Nine Eleven or in German: Neunelfer) is a two-door 2+2 high performance rear-engined sports car introduced in September 1964 by Porsche AG of Stuttgart, Germany.

title: Ferrari F355
cardDetailedText: The Ferrari F355 (Type F129) is a sports car manufactured by Italian car manufacturer. Ferrari produced from May 1994 to 1999. The car is a heavily revised Ferrari 348 with notable exterior and performance changes. The F355 was succeeded by the all-new Ferrari 360 in 1999
